name: Salat Times
author: M.A. IMRAN

sections.description:
Displays Salat (Namaz) timetable on your site for any location around the world, based on a variety of calculation methods currently used in muslim communities.

Usage

  • Install and activate the plugin.
  • Navigate to: Settings > Salat Times.
  • Use widget or shortcode.

Main Features:

  • Easy admin panel.
  • Beautiful widgets.
  • Automatic/Manual Time.
  • Hijri and Gregorian Date.
  • Timetable for any location.
  • Language: English, Bengali and others.
  • Different calculation methods for different region.

Need more features or customization?

  • Just send a mail to imran2w@gmail.com

Credits

  • Developer: M.A. IMRAN
  • E-Mail: imran2w@gmail.com
  • Website: imran.link

sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin.
  2. Go to: Dashboard > Plugins > Add New > Upload.
  3. Upload, install and activate the plugin.
  4. Done!
  5. Use widget: “Daily Salat Times”.
sections.faq:
How does it work?

  • Widget: “Daily Salat Times”
  • Shortcode: [daily_salat_times]
  • PHP Code:

upgrade_notice: After upgrading to version 2.0 from version 1.3 or older, click on "Restore Default Settings" button on Salat Times Settings page. Otherwise widget may not work properly.
